title: Can't Movement Click off PAD
body:
I'm on my friends computer and he cant move his champion with a movement command off the spawn pad (i tried multiple bindings) i cant get his champion to move off the recall/base pad, he can target units but he cant do anything else, all abils and such still wrok he just cant move anywhere but on the pad making lol impossible to play

TL;DR: Cant move off pad unless attacking a unit, can move on pad tho

replies.body:
happened to a friend yesterday, it's as if the beginning area is still blocked off, even after the 15seconds. 

for him it just went away at like 40 seconds by itself.
yeah exactly, but this one stayed for around 15 minutes, we figured out a solution, delting the config file in Lols files itself, manually resetting them
